name: Breaded Chicken Cutlets
ingredients: 1 boneless chicken breast, pounded flat (about 9 ounces) *
1 ounce finely crushed pork rinds (about 1/4 cup)

instructions.en: Beat the egg white in a shallow bowl or pie plate with a fork until frothy.
In another bowl or pie plate, mix the crushed pork rinds, parmesan cheese, and seasonings.
Coat the chicken with the egg whites, then coat well with the crumb mixture.
Heat 1-2 tablespoons of oil over medium to medium-high heat in a large nonstick skillet.
Fry the chicken on both sides until golden brown and cooked through.

notes: * The recipe used a large chicken breast, enough for two small servings. Not all of the pork rind mixture was used, so about 1/4 of it was deducted from the nutritional counts. This recipe makes 1-2 servings.
